thread.title: Ram Charan Reacts On Dasari's Sensational Comments About Rudramadevi-Bruce Lee Clash
thread.title_full: Ram Charan Reacts On Dasari's Sensational Comments About Rudramadevi-Bruce Lee Clash

title: Ram Charan Reacts On Dasari's Sensational Comments About Rudramadevi-Bruce Lee Clash
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Updated: Wednesday, October 14, 2015, 15:34 [IST] 
Ram Charan has reconfirmed that it is not their fault that the film is clashing with Rudramadevi. The actor was busy in promotions of his Friday release Bruce Lee and when he was asked to react on the comments of Dasari in one of the interviews, he explained the situation subtly. 
"We have no clue that Rudramadevi is releasing before us until it actually released, if we know it any time before, we should have definitely moved our release. But now we cannot do anything as a lot of business is involved and it is our producer's call completely. I have nothing to do with it.", Ram Charan tried to explain. 
Talking at the success meet of Rudramadevi, Dasari suggested that Bruce Lee should think of a later date as big films like it doesn't really need a festive season to make enough money. 
Dasari further questioned, why they were hurrying up for a release and doubted if it is some kind of revenge, which actually triggered a controversy. 
Apparently, Charan had already reacted once on the clash, before Dasari coming into the picture. The actor recalled that they announced the date 8 months in prior and it is not their fault if other films come for a clash. VIDEO: Ram Charan Reacts On Dasari's Sensational Comments 1/5 
Watch Dasari's allegations and Charan's explanation in the video. VIDEO: Ram Charan Reacts On Dasari's Sensational Comments 2/5 
Ram Charan talking about the clash, in a previous interview. VIDEO: Ram Charan Reacts On Dasari's Sensational Comments 3/5 — Allu Arjun (@alluarjun) October 12, 2015 Allu Arjun 
Allu Arjun about Rudramadevi's clash with Bruce Lee VIDEO: Ram Charan Reacts On Dasari's Sensational Comments 4/5 Absolutely agree with what @alluarjun had to say abt release dates. When Release dates of a films r changed 6 to 7 times its tht films fault — Nikhil Siddhartha (@actor_Nikhil) October 13, 2015 Nikhil 
Nikhil has extended his support to Allu Arjun regarding the clash. You might like
